member.name: HANDLE_SHARING_OPTIONS
member.summary: Defines the requested sharing mode of the file handle.

member.name: HANDLE_SHARING_OPTIONS.HSO_SHARE_NONE
member.summary: Prevents other processes from opening a file if they request delete, read, or write access.

member.name: HANDLE_SHARING_OPTIONS.HSO_SHARE_READ
member.summary: Enables subsequent open operations on a file to request read access. Otherwise, other processes cannot open the file if they request read access.

member.name: HANDLE_SHARING_OPTIONS.HSO_SHARE_WRITE
member.summary: Enables subsequent open operations on a file to request write access. Otherwise, other processes cannot open the file if they request write access.

member.name: HANDLE_SHARING_OPTIONS.HSO_SHARE_DELETE
member.summary: Enables subsequent open operations on a file to request delete access. Otherwise, other processes cannot open the file if they request delete access.
